title: A couple of classes are missing from the .zip and .tar balls
description:
org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardTokenizerConstants.java
org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardTokenizerTokenManager.java
org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardTokenizer.java

are missing.

However, 
org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardTokenizer.jj is included in both the
.zip and the .tar balls.

Jim

comments.content:
You did not specify which nightly build.  Each nightly build comes in 4
different versions.  The 2 versions named lucene-src.tar.gz and lucene-src.zip
include sources only. *.jj files are JavaCC grammar files that you can convert
into .java and then .class files using the included Ant build.xml.
This is not a bug, so I will close this bug.
If, however, you downloaded a binary nightly build and it contains .jj files and
not those 3 that you say are missing, please feel free to re-open this bug report.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
